page.title: 17LIFE STYLES
page.content: There have been many changes in life styles over the past years, for example shopping. Most people do their shopping once a week or maybe every fortnight. Many people shop at the two hypermarkets on the outskirts of the town. Because the majority of families have a refrigerator and a freezer it is possible to keep food for quite a long time and so people do not have to go shopping as often as they used to. Fashions have changed too. The summer fashion this year is floral designs and pastel colours. Fashions change quickly nowadays and many people wear an outfit for only one year. There are few teenage fashion shops in Dunfermline but with the introduction of the new shopping centre that may change soon.
